sentences.sContent: After the storm, the ground was littered with twigs and branches.
sentences.sCn: 暴风雨过后，满地都是大大小小的树枝。

sentences.sContent: The bank has branches all over the country.
sentences.sCn: 这家银行在全国各地都有分行。

sentences.sContent: All branches of government are having to cut costs.
sentences.sCn: 所有政府部门都必须削减开支。

synos.tran: [林]树枝，[植]分枝；分部；[地理][水文]支流

phrases.pCn: 主枝；主分支；中央领导技
橄榄枝（象征和平）；谈和的建议；小孩
v. 长出枝条；扩展范围；偏离主题
（英国警察部门的）政治保安处
国外分支机构；海外分店

words.tran: 分叉；扩展（branch的过去分词）；长出树枝

remMethod.val: “不让吃” → 不让小羊吃树枝 → 树枝

trans.tranCn: 枝条；分支;分部;支流；部门
trans.tranOther: a part of a tree that grows out from the trunk (等于main stem ) and that has leaves, fruit, or smaller branches growing from it
